TestCaseMetaData.name: Pap_Smear
TestCaseMetaData.Description: Mrs. Delores Lopez is a 30 year old hispanic female who presents to the Women's Clinic And Family Counseling Center for a routine gynecological examination. A pap smear sample is collected after confirming with Ms Lopez that her last menstrual period was two weeks ago. A pap smear is ordered from Century Hospital's clinical lab through the Clinic's EHR and the specimen is sent to the lab for testing.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support Ask at Order Entry (AOE) questions.
